title: 75/63/ECSC: Commission Decision of 19 December 1974 authorizing amendment of the terms of business of Ruhrkohle AG, Essen (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 19 December 1974  authorizing amendment of the terms of business of Ruhrkohle AG, Essen  (Only the German text is authentic)  (75/63/ECSC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amendment to its terms of business applied for by Ruhrkohle AG by letter dated 23 October 1974 is hereby authorized.
This Decision is addressed to Ruhrkohle AG, Essen.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 December 1974.
For the Commission
The President
François-Xavier ORTOLI  (1)OJ No L 120, 7.5.1973, p. 14.
